javadoc:
Helper class to manage the events that plugins consume and produce.
 This class keeps track of the last events that went out so that when
 a plugin is added, it receives those events.

methods.javadoc:
Construct a new EventManager.
@param tool plugin tool associated with this EventManager
methods.name: <init>

params.name: tool
params.comment: plugin tool associated with this EventManager

methods.name: addEventListener
methods.comment:
Add a plugin event listener that will be notified when an event of
 the given event class is generated.

params.name: eventClass
params.comment: class of the event of interest

methods.name: removeEventListener
methods.comment:
Remove the plugin event listener from the list of listeners notified
 when an event of the given event class is generated.

params.name: eventClass
params.comment: class of the event of interest

methods.name: addToolListener
methods.comment:
Add the given tool listener to a list of tool listeners notified
 when tool events are generated.

methods.javadoc:
Remove the given tool listener from the list of tool listeners.
@param listener listener to remove
methods.name: removeToolListener
methods.comment: Remove the given tool listener from the list of tool listeners.

methods.javadoc:
Return whether there are any registered tool listeners for the
 tool associated with this EventManager.
methods.name: hasToolListeners
methods.comment:
Return whether there are any registered tool listeners for the
 tool associated with this EventManager.

methods.javadoc:
Add the class for the PluginEvent that a plugin will produce.
@param eventClass class for the PluginEvent
methods.name: addEventProducer
methods.comment: Add the class for the PluginEvent that a plugin will produce.

methods.javadoc:
Remove the class of a PluginEvent that a plugin produces.
@param eventClass class for the PluginEvent
methods.name: removeEventProducer
methods.comment: Remove the class of a PluginEvent that a plugin produces.

methods.javadoc:
Get the names of all events produced by plugins in the tool.
@return array of PluginEvent names
methods.name: getEventsProduced
methods.comment: Get the names of all events produced by plugins in the tool.

methods.javadoc:
Get the names of all events consumed by plugins in the tool.
@return array of PluginEvent names
methods.name: getEventsConsumed
methods.comment: Get the names of all events consumed by plugins in the tool.

methods.name: fireEvent
methods.comment:
Notify all plugin listeners that are registered to consume the given
 event. Events are fired in the SwingThread.

methods.name: processToolEvent
methods.comment:
Convert the given tool event to a plugin event, and notify the
 appropriate plugin event listeners.

methods.javadoc: Clear the list of last plugin events fired.
methods.name: clearLastEvents
methods.comment: Clear the list of last plugin events fired.

methods.name: getLastEvents
methods.comment:
Return an array of the last plugin events fired. EventManager 
 maps the event class to the last event fired.

methods.javadoc: Send all events on the queue
methods.name: sendEvents
methods.comment: Send all events on the queue

methods.name: removeEventListener
methods.comment:
Remove the event listener by className; the plugin registered for
 events, but the construction failed.

params.name: className
params.comment: class name of the plugin (event listener)

name: EventManager
comment:
Helper class to manage the events that plugins consume and produce.
 This class keeps track of the last events that went out so that when
 a plugin is added, it receives those events.
